actions.committee: House Committee on Interstate and Foreign Commerce
actions.text: Referred to House Committee on Interstate and Foreign Commerce.

official_title: A bill to amend the Clean Air Act to prohibit the Environmental Protection Agency from imposing parking surcharges.

summary.text: Revises the Clean Air Act by prohibiting the Administrator of the Environmental Protection Agency from promulgating parking surcharges as a part of an implementation plan under the Act.

titles.title: A bill to amend the Clean Air Act to prohibit the Environmental Protection Agency from imposing parking surcharges.
